item.description: Tears rolled down Nanae Munemasa's face in a studio full of people, but not the type of tears she's used to crying. These were tears of joy, disbelief, and a little bit of sadness that time was almost up on a dream that recently became, briefly, her reality.

Do restaurant menu calorie counts change the way we eat?
item.description: Chain restaurants in the United States will be required to list calorie information on their menus starting in December 2016. But the few chains that already post the information beat out the competition in low-calorie offerings, according to a study.
